title: Coastal Escape Two Hours from Melbourne
description:
Your oceanside escape awaits just two hours outside Melbourne’s vibrant CBD at RACV Inverloch Resort, set in southern Gippsland amid pristine wetlands and the family-friendly beaches of Bass Strait. The perfect stopover point between Phillip Island and Wilsons Prom, this resort invites you to discover spectacular views from the clifftops along the Bunurong Coastal Drive, ramble through the rock pools of Bunurong Marine National Park and get lost in the town’s beautiful natural surroundings. 

Visit the kid-friendly Screw Creek Nature Walk to explore the Marshlands or take a stroll along the cliffs of George Bass Coastal Walk, before returning to RACV Inverloch Resort. It’s here that you can float away in a 25-metre swimming pool with sauna and spa or sample some of the finest local produce at Radius Restaurant.
